import"@types/chrome";// Function called when a new message is received
var messagesFromReactAppListener=function messagesFromReactAppListener(msg,sender,sendResponse){console.log("[content.js]. Message received",msg);var headlines=Array.from(document.getElementsByTagName("h1")).map(function(h1){return h1.innerText;});// Prepare the response object with information about the site
var response={title:document.title,headlines:headlines};sendResponse(response);};/**
 * Fired when a message is sent from either an extension process or a content script.
 */chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener(messagesFromReactAppListener);
